summary.span: 表示 对象的有序集合。

span.span: Represents an ordered collection of objects.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 一个具有隐式上下文关联。A has implied context affinity. 如果一个过程尝试访问所属的上下文之外的其他上下文从，将引发异常。If a procedure attempts to access the from a different context than the context of the owning , an exception is thrown. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何创建并向其添加成员。The following example shows how to create a and add members to it. remarks.format: ## Remarks 添加其值是`null`允许存在并且不会引发异常。Adding a whose value is `null` is permitted and does not raise an exception. 方法还设置了父-子关系之间父可视对象，它是所有者的，和子`visual`。The method also sets up the parent-child relationship between the parent visual, which is the owner of the , and the child `visual`. 如果需要更好地自定义类的可视子对象的基础存储实现的低级别控制，请考虑使用和方法。If you need greater low-level control over the underlying storage implementation of visual child objects of a custom class, consider using the and methods. 当使用这些方法时，必须定义您自己的存储实现，而不要使用。When you use these methods, you must define your own storage implementation, and do not use . ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何创建并向其添加成员。The following example shows how to create a and add members to it. remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果已等于，则容量的增加之前新插入。If already equals , the capacity of the is increased before the new is inserted. 如果`index`等同于，`visual`添加到末尾。If `index` is equal to , `visual` is added to the end of . 任何现有视觉对象的对象等于或大于`index`将移动，以容纳新，并更新其索引值。Any existing visual objects that are equal to or greater than `index` are shifted to accommodate the new , and their index values are updated. 方法还设置了父-子关系之间父可视对象，它是所有者的，和子`visual`。The method also sets up the parent-child relationship between the parent visual, which is the owner of the , and the child `visual`. 如果需要更好地可视子对象的基础存储实现的低级别控制，请考虑使用和方法。If you need greater low-level control over the underlying storage implementation of visual child objects, consider using the and methods. 当使用这些方法时，定义您自己的存储实现，并且不使用。When you use these methods, you define your own storage implementation, and do not use .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 请按照所移除的对象的视觉对象将移动，以占用空出的位置，并更新其索引值。The visual objects that follow the removed object are shifted to occupy the vacated position, and their index values are updated. 如果`visual`是`null`，第一个`null`中移除项。If `visual` is `null`, the first `null` entry is removed. 请注意，移除`null`条目上呈线性集合的大小。Note that removing a `null` entry is linear in the size of the collection. 方法还会删除之间父可视对象，它是所有者的父-子关系的，和子`visual`。The method also removes the parent-child relationship between the parent visual, which is the owner of the , and the child `visual`. 如果需要更好地可视子对象的基础存储实现的低级别控制，请考虑使用和方法。If you need greater low-level control over the underlying storage implementation of visual child objects, consider using the and methods. 当使用这些方法时，定义您自己的存储实现，并且不使用。When you use these methods, you define your own storage implementation, and do not use .
